column2: Works but needs some UX attention E.g. sync icons showing on all synced entries instead of just the ones waiting to be synced
column3: some way to search for the intersections of tags
but needs attention to UI This is a decent app but it suffers from glitches and a very rudimentary interface. For example
column4: when reading a bookmark using the Instapaper viewer
column5: rotating your device will cause the page to reload
column6: losing your place. A few well-placed pixels and some smoother interactions would go a long way towards making this good app a great one.
